title: Where is the setting to display "pm" and "am" on Pixel 4a lock-screen and top left clock?
content: How do add the "pm" and "am" to the digital clock on the top left corner? and how do I add "pm" and "am" to the clock on the lock-screen? I always have to log-in, then open my clock application program just to see if it's "pm" or "am". Yes, I live in a sewer and never see the sunlight, so I need to know if it's "am" or "pm". It seems that the only way to know if it's "pm" or "am" is to open the clock application program. And I can't use a 24-hour clock 'coz I have a phobia of the 24-hour clock; I need a 12 hour clock with "pm" and "am" displayed. Thanks.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
